special_text:
At the beginning of each end step, if you spent three or more mana this turn, put two loyalty counters on Alexa, Called to War.
[-2]: Exile target card in your graveyard. Until end of turn, you may cast a copy of it. [i](Copies of permanent spells enter as tokens)[/i]
[-2]: Alexa deals 3 damage to any target and you gain 3 life.
[-2]: Target noncreature, nonland permanent becomes a Forest land and loses all other types and abilities.
